fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Culture, Business and Industry, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: All initiatives relevant to the language technology industry. These include, but are not limited to: Digital initiatives like New Generation Internet, the Digital Single Market, and legislation touching upon LT in its widest sense.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: LT-Innovate is the Association of the Language Technology Industry. Language Technology makes the world intelligent, multilingual and interactive. LT-Innovate promotes all sectors of LT e.g. translation, speech, analytics.
relevant_communication:
LT Industry Summit (once a year) 
Position Papers (when appropriate)
legal_status: Company Limited by Guarantee - not for profit
position: Chairman of the Board of Directors
